titleStmt.title: Self-conflict, or, The powerful motions between the flesh & spirit represented in the person and upon the occasion of Joseph when by Potiphar's wife he was enticed to adultery : a divine poem / written originally in low-Dutch by Jacob Catts ... ; and from thence translated.
Self-stryt. English
titleStmt.author: Cats, Jacob, 1577-1660.
Quarles, John, 1624-1665.
Quarles, John, 1624-1665. Triumphant chastity.

notesStmt.note: A translation by John Quarles of Cat's Self-stryt ...
Subsequently issued as an original work by Quarles under the title Triumphant chastity ...
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
